text: Falao de jiaren zhong yi wei yincang xinyang de nan xinshi shuo:“Dang yige ren que yi daizhe cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de mingzhengdaoda nimen, zhi yin ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi an la”, nandao nimen jiu yao shahai ta ma [zhu]? Jiaru ta shi shuohuang zhe, name, ta zi shou qi hai; jiaru ta shi shuo shihua zhe, name, tasuo weihe nimen de zainan, youxie bi jiang jianglin nimen. An la jue bu yindao guofen zhe [ru wugu sharen, chaoyue fadu, gan dazui he duo shen chongbai deng] he shuohuang zhe.
